name: Under a Blue Star
tagline: A story of times and worlds collidong...
body:
#The universe

Earth-Year 971 of the 24th era of solage II: Planet "PX842-E3" is discovered and classified as a Q-type B2 planet orbiting SX842 "blue dwarf"-type star by migratory telescope.

Earth-Year 976 of the 24th era of solage II: Pal-One Senate denies approval to PX842-E3 colonial plan and edicts a starmap removal d√©cret of the object. Senate Iondile's full statement "...What? A blue dwarf star? What is this stupid algorithm saying... Bloody scientist interns. Next!".

...And that's basically how manking ended, you can blame it on administrative paperwork!

#Releases
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
